node.doctext:
To Do

  • Allow some form of "voting" - probably just a variation of the C!, an "I like it!" button
  • Allow guest users to message writers who have been online in the past 6 months
  • Delete News for Noders
  • Replace Log list / random saying with Staff Picks nodelet
  • Replace Random Nodes code with Staff Picks code
  • Add small nodelet that provides a simple set of FAQ-ish paragraphs: "Did You Know?"
  • Remove Vitals nodelet
  • Full Text Search
node.title: Fixing The Guest User Experience
